name: claude-memory-beads
description: Complete workflow system for team collaboration featuring Memory Bank documentation patterns, Beads git-native issue tracking, and orchestrated subagent workflows (planning → coding → testing). Includes productivity commands (/prepare, /plan) and specialized skills for filtered build output and E2E testing.

features.name: Memory Bank System
features.description: Structured documentation approach with shared/personal namespaces for team knowledge management

features.name: Beads Issue Tracking
features.description: Git-native issue tracker with dependency awareness and JSONL export/import workflow

features.name: Orchestrated Subagents
features.description: Specialized agents for planning, coding, and testing that work together in isolated contexts

features.name: Productivity Commands
features.description: Essential slash commands like /prepare (workspace orientation) and /plan (feature planning)

features.name: Filtered Output Skills
features.description: Skills for quiet-build and quiet-deploy that reduce context noise during CI operations
